<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crowd Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=7727) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Shining Kingdoms](/Sources.aspx?ID=265) pg. 170

**Archetype** [Lion Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=319)

**Prerequisites**
[Lost in the Crowd](/Feats.aspx?ID=7726)

</column>

---

You use the crowd to your advantage, diverting your foes’ attention to potential hidden dangers in the crowd. When determining if your foe is [flanked](/Rules.aspx?ID=2375), treat all squares occupied by a crowd as if they were occupied by an ally with a melee reach of 5 feet.
name: Crowd Mastery
